snippet: Seeking a pathway to citizenship, leaders of United We Dream came together to celebrate and reinforce a common culture, based on their experience living with hidden identities.
abstract: Reporter's Notebook; more than 600 leaders of United We Dream, largest national network of young illegal immigrants, meet in Kansas City, Mo, for their yearly congress; group, which takes its name from Dream Act, seeks to open legal pathway to citizenship and to celebrate and reinforce a common culture, based on their experience living with hidden identities.
lead_paragraph: Seeking a pathway to citizenship, leaders of United We Dream came together to celebrate and reinforce a common culture, based on their experience living with hidden identities.

keywords.value: Dream Act (Development, Relief and Education for Minors Act)
keywords.name: subject
